product_overview: FoodFitnessTracker is a comprehensive nutrition and fitness tracking web application designed to empower users with AI-assisted dietary management, personalized nutrition coaching, and visual analytics to improve their health and wellness.
core_goals: Provide users with an intuitive and robust food logging system featuring AI-powered nutritional analysis and barcode scanning.
Offer a personalized AI nutrition coach that delivers real-time recommendations and health insights via chat interface.
Enable detailed nutrition tracking and analytics with interactive charts and progress monitoring tools.
Ensure secure user authentication and profile management, maintaining data privacy and user preferences.
Deliver an engaging user experience with responsive design, customizable themes, and a clean dashboard interface.
key_features: Complete user authentication system with login, registration, and session management using Passport.js and Firebase.
Main dashboard showcasing nutrition tracking, progress visualization, and quick access to key features.
Comprehensive food entry system enhanced by AI analysis and barcode scanning capabilities.
AI Coach Assistant offering personalized nutrition advice and health tips through an interactive chat.
Advanced nutrition tracking and analytics using Chart.js for visual data representation.
User profile and settings management to tailor the application to individual needs.
Attractive landing page to introduce product features and engage new users.
Customizable theme system including dark and light modes with user toggles.
Backend data management with MongoDB providing reliable storage and API endpoints.
Reusable UI components and custom React hooks for consistent and efficient front-end development.
user_flow_summary: User registers and logs into the application securely via the authentication system.
Upon login, user lands on the dashboard where they can view their nutrition status and recent activity.
User logs food entries through a form that supports manual input, barcode scanning, and AI-powered nutritional breakdown.
Users interact with the AI Coach through a chat interface to receive personalized advice and recommendations.
Users monitor their nutrition and health statistics via visual charts and summaries available in the tracker and stats pages.
Users update their profile information and preferences through the profile management pages.
Users can toggle between light and dark themes to customize their viewing experience.
New users access the landing page to learn about the app, see feature highlights, and sign up.
validation_criteria: All user authentication flows perform reliably and securely with proper session management.
Food entry inputs correctly invoke AI analysis and barcode scanning with accurate nutritional breakdown.
AI Coach provides relevant, personalized, and contextually appropriate recommendations.
Nutrition tracking charts display accurate and up-to-date data reflecting user inputs.
User profile settings save and load correctly with persistence across sessions.
Theme toggle works seamlessly switching between dark and light modes without UI glitches.
Landing page content loads correctly and is visually appealing across devices.
Backend API endpoints respond correctly and securely handle user data storage and retrieval.
UI components render correctly and maintain consistent styling with DaisyUI integration.
Application is responsive and functions correctly across defined viewport sizes: desktop, tablet, and mobile.
